meanings.definition: A substance that causes an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: The allergin in peanuts can make some people very sick.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often test for different types of allergins to find out what is causing an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky allergin in the flowers made Lily sneeze uncontrollably during the garden party.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume was like an invisible allergin, triggering a reaction in everyone who came near her.
meanings.sent5: The allergin in the air was so strong that even the slightest exposure caused a severe rash.

meanings.definition: A person who is allergic to a particular substance.
meanings.sent1: As an allergin to cats, Sarah always avoided visiting her friend who had a pet cat.
meanings.sent2: The allergin carried an EpiPen at all times in case of a severe allergic reaction.
meanings.sent3: Despite being an allergin to shellfish, Tom accidentally ate shrimp at the party and had to rush to the hospital.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an allergin in a field of flowers, surrounded by things that could trigger her allergies.
meanings.sent5: The allergin was careful to read food labels to avoid any potential allergic reactions.
